title: Research data quality: AskUserQuestion-input, Skill-input, KillShell-input
description: Analyze samples of AskUserQuestion-input, Skill-input, KillShell-input. For each type: extract samples, score relevance, recommend handling strategy.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Paper 1 (AskUserQuestion-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'AskUserQuestion-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 1 (AskUserQuestion-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 2 (Skill-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'Skill-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 2 (Skill-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
Paper 3 (KillShell-input): Extract 5+ samples of 'KillShell-input' from ~/.claude/projects/ JSONL files
Paper 3 (KillShell-input): Analyze each sample - is it useful for search? Score 1-5 relevance
